data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Schellenberg words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Schellenberg, Liechtenstein
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Schellenberg, Liechtenstein so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Schellenberg, Liechtenstein to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Schellenberg. Through your servants plant 2 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Schellenberg a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Schellenberg.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Schellenberg, Liechtenstein a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.
